name: MrLavaLoba
body:
### Welcome to MrLavaLoba.
MrLavaLoba is a python code for the stochastic simulation of lava flows.

### Authors and Contributors
Mattia de' Michieli Vitturi (@demichie) and Simone Tarquini

### Support or Contact
email: mattia.demichielivitturi@NOSPAMingv.it
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
